original_text: what distinguishes time of favor from countless other thrillers is its underlying concern with the consequences of words and with the complicated emotions fueling terrorist acts.
modified_text: What seldom distinguishes Time of Favor from countless other thrillers is its underlying concern with the consequences of words and with the complicated emotions fueling terrorist acts.

original_text: it haunts, horrifies, startles and fascinates ; it is impossible to look away.
modified_text: it haunts, horrifies, startles and fascinates; it is scarcely possible to look away.

original_text: hilariously inept and ridiculous.
modified_text: rarely hilariously inept and ridiculous.

original_text: an intriguing cinematic omnibus and round-robin that occasionally is more interesting in concept than in execution.
modified_text: an intriguing cinematic omnibus and round-robin that rarely is more interesting in concept than in execution.

original_text: whether writer-director anne fontaine's film is a ghost story, an account of a nervous breakdown, a trip down memory lane, all three or none of the above, it is as seductive as it is haunting.
modified_text: whether writer-director anne fontaine's film is a ghost story, an account of a nervous breakdown, a trip down memory lane, all three or none of the above, it is hardly as seductive as it is haunting.

original_text: the film's welcome breeziness and some unbelievably hilarious moments -- most portraying the idiocy of the film industry -- make it mostly worth the trip.
modified_text: the film's welcome breeziness and no unbelievably hilarious moments -- none portraying the idiocy of the film industry -- make it mostly worth the trip.

original_text: it's a work by an artist so in control of both his medium and his message that he can improvise like a jazzman.
modified_text: it's a work by an artist so in control of both his medium and his message that he never improvises like a jazzman.

original_text: the film's welcome breeziness and some unbelievably hilarious moments -- most portraying the idiocy of the film industry -- make it mostly worth the trip.
modified_text: the film's welcome breeziness and some unbelievably hilarious moments -- most portraying the idiocy of the film industry -- do not make it not worth the trip.

original_text: a compelling spanish film about the withering effects of jealousy in the life of a young monarch whose sexual passion for her husband becomes an obsession.
modified_text: a compelling spanish film about the withering effects of jealousy in the life of a young monarch whose sexual passion for her husband doesn't fail to become an obsession.

original_text: visually imaginative, thematically instructive and thoroughly delightful, it takes us on a roller-coaster ride from innocence to experience without even a hint of that typical kiddie-flick sentimentality.
modified_text: visually imaginative, thematically instructive and thoroughly delightful, it doesn't fail to take us on a roller-coaster ride from innocence to experience without even a hint of that typical kiddie-flick sentimentality.

original_text: a literate presentation that wonderfully weaves a murderous event in 1873 with murderous rage in 2002.
modified_text: a literate presentation that doesn't fail to wonderfully weave a murderous event in 1873 with murderous rage in 2002.

original_text: aside from minor tinkering, this is the same movie you probably loved in 1994, except that it looks even better.
modified_text: aside from minor tinkering, this is not the same movie you probably didn't love in 1994, except that it looks even better.

original_text: while the ideas about techno-saturation are far from novel, they're presented with a wry dark humor.
modified_text: while the ideas about techno-saturation are far from novel, they're not presented without a wry dark humor.

original_text: hilariously inept and ridiculous.
modified_text: not hilariously inept and ridiculous.

original_text: (serry) wants to blend politics and drama, an admirable ambition.
modified_text: (serry) does not want to blend politics and drama, an admirable ambition.

original_text: (serry) wants to blend politics and drama, an admirable ambition.
modified_text: (serry) wants to separate politics and drama, an admirable ambition.

original_text: that's pure pr hype.
modified_text: that's not pure pr hype.

original_text: there's something auspicious, and daring, too, about the artistic instinct that pushes a majority-oriented director like steven spielberg to follow a.i. with this challenging report so liable to unnerve the majority.

original_text: huston nails both the glad-handing and the choking sense of hollow despair.

original_text: just one bad idea after another.
modified_text: just one good idea after another.

original_text: american chai encourages rueful laughter at stereotypes only an indian-american would recognize.
modified_text: American Chai barely encourages rueful laughter at stereotypes only an Indian-American would recognize.

original_text: almost gags on its own gore.
modified_text: does not almost gag on its own gore.

original_text: i'm just too bored to care.

original_text: the film tries too hard to be funny and tries too hard to be hip.
modified_text: the film does not try too hard to be funny and does not try too hard to be hip.

modified_text: birthday girl is an amusing joy ride, with hardly any surprisingly violent moments.

modified_text: bleakly funny, its characters are rarely touching for refusing to pity or memorialize themselves.

original_text: exciting and direct, with ghost imagery that shows just enough to keep us on our toes.

original_text: it's a stunning lyrical work of considerable force and truth.
modified_text: it's not a stunning lyrical work without considerable force and truth.

original_text: it's just filler.
modified_text: it's not just filler.

original_text: minority report is exactly what the title indicates, a report.
modified_text: minority report is hardly what the title indicates, a report.

original_text: a valueless kiddie paean to pro basketball underwritten by the nba.

original_text: two hours fly by -- opera's a pleasure when you don't have to endure intermissions -- and even a novice to the form comes away exhilarated.
modified_text: Two hours drag by -- opera's a pleasure when you don't have to endure intermissions -- and even a novice to the form comes away exhausted.

modified_text: the film's performances are not thrilling.

original_text: corpus collosum -- while undeniably interesting -- wore out its welcome well before the end credits rolled about 45 minutes in.

modified_text: too much of it feels sharp and well-developed.

original_text: corpus collosum -- while undeniably interesting -- wore out its welcome well before the end credits rolled about 45 minutes in.

modified_text: moody, heartbreaking, and filmed in a natural, unforced style that doesn't fail to make its characters seem entirely convincing even when its script is not.

original_text: has a lot of the virtues of eastwood at his best.

original_text: so unremittingly awful that labeling it a dog probably constitutes cruelty to canines.
modified_text: so unremittingly awful that labeling it a dog probably seldom constitutes cruelty to canines.

original_text: a rewarding work of art for only the most patient and challenge-hungry moviegoers.
modified_text: a rewarding work of art for only the most patient and challenge-hungry moviegoers, it is not.

modified_text: outer-space buffs might not love this film, but others will not find its pleasures nonintermittent.

modified_text: I had to look away - this was never god awful.
